data.actual_result: There's just one button. even that's for answering the call only with voice.
data.expected_result: There are 3 buttons. One to accept the call, other to deny it and the third one to accept with voice as seen in the case when you receive a video call from a friend.
data.short_description: You cannot accept an incoming video call from a non-friend as a video call. You get to accept it only as a voice call.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a non-friend video call you. - Go to the DM. - Expand the voice bar. - Observe the accept button.
